comments.body: It looks like the return on this is shown as a single item (`{allowed: .... }`) when it should be `{items: [{allowed: .....}, ...]}`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +55,59 @@  gcp_compute_firewall_facts:
      filters:
      - name = test_object
      project: test_project
      auth_kind: service_account
